original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate efficiently. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging cutting-edge machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive process improvements and enhance system performance.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them clearly and concisely using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into effective technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Solid understanding of SQL and database management concepts

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive process improvements and enhance system performance

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working within Agile methodologies
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Databases and data analysis tools (e.g., SQL, reporting, visualization)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment, requiring strong communication and coordination with stakeholders from various departments
- Flexible work arrangements, including the potential for remote work, with a focus on achieving results rather than time spent in the office
- Continuous learning and professional development opportunities to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies

Role Overview:
This role is a unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise, serving as a critical link between our organization's operational needs and the underlying systems that support them. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for ensuring our vehicle configuration processes are efficient, accurate, and aligned with evolving business requirements. Through your deep understanding of both the business and technical domains, you will drive innovative solutions that leverage the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to streamline operations and enhance system performance.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate the identified business requirements into effective technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data to gain valuable insights
- Proactively identify ways to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through the implementation of configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the effectiveness of the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems, think critically, and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Solid understanding of SQL and database management concepts

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of implementing and leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive process improvements and enhance system performance

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working within Agile methodologies
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Databases and data analysis tools (e.g., SQL, reporting, visualization)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment, requiring strong communication and coordination with stakeholders from various departments
- Flexible work arrangements, including the potential for remote work, with a focus on achieving results rather than time spent in the office
- Continuous learning and professional development opportunities to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies

- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data to gain valuable insights

- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the effectiveness of the solutions

- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools
